body_html: I don't think that this is a seed issue. I tested a couple different seeds and the test fails on all of them. Interestingly, TestNN.test_L1Loss_cuda doesn't fail. So this might be a CPU kernel thing?
body_text: I don't think that this is a seed issue. I tested a couple different seeds and the test fails on all of them. Interestingly, TestNN.test_L1Loss_cuda doesn't fail. So this might be a CPU kernel thing?
body: I don't think that this is a seed issue. I tested a couple different seeds and the test fails on all of them. Interestingly, `TestNN.test_L1Loss_cuda` doesn't fail. So this might be a CPU kernel thing?
